content.prompt: Which of the following methods is most appropriate to use to determine the number of different-colored components in a sample of black ink?

choices.label: Elemental analysis to determine the mass ratio of C:H:N:O
Column chromatography using a nonpolar stationary phase and water as the mobile phase
Paper chromatography using different solvents with a range of polarities as the mobile phase

skill.text: 2.C: Identify experimental procedures that are aligned to a scientific question (which may include a sketch of a lab setup).
